alert.note: Alert for Bates; Cass; Henry (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 6:42PM CDT until July 17 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cass County in west central Missouri... Southwestern Henry County in west central Missouri... Northeastern Bates County in west central Missouri... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 641 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Garden City, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Butler, Adrian, Archie, Creighton, Passaic and Ballard. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
